Question: This person led the league with 4,267 passing yards and threw 29 touchdowns; he was named first-team All-Pro and to the Pro Bowl.
Hints: This person led his 6th game-winning drive of the season and the Colts pulled away 31–21.
In the game, this person completed 19 of 26 passes for 253 yards, 2 touchdowns, and no interceptions.
In the Wild Card game against Denver, this person passed for 458 yards and 4 touchdowns.
